title: From waste to resource: a multidimensional analysis of sewage sludge thermochemical treatment efficiency across temperatures
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00255E, Paper
Shiqi Liu, Guoxia Wei, Hanqiao Liu, Yuwen Zhu, Huizhen Shi, Yi Lian
Sewage sludge (SS) thermochemical treatment is considered as an effective management scheme in the transition to low carbon and sustainable development from conventional SS treatment.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
